tab1.title1: <TextStyle.Green>Welcome to Unity Gamers Community Ark ascended!</>
tab1.text1:
Our servers are PVE based, with NPC additions.
Please take the time to read the RULES and browse through the other tabs.
For any other question/info or want to join the community then connect to our Discord via the discord link below.

Have fun & stay safe!

tab2.text1:
Although our server is PvE, with the NPC mod, its more PvEvNPC.
This means the base server setting is PVE so there is no 'player vs player' allowed.
With NPC mod however, it offers an 'environment' based pvp style of play.
NPC's are humanoid non-player characters that spawn in the world. They build their own bases with base defenses.
They are naturally aggressive or hostile. Approach them with caution!
NPC's will actively hunt you down and knock you out if you encroach on their territory.
They are tameable - by knockout only. The different NPC's perform different functions once tamed.
NPC's will periodically raid your base in small raiding parties (only while you're online).
More info on NPCs can be found in the NPC link below.

We are using the ArkShop plugin with a UI mod. Hit <TextStyle.Orange>F2</> to access the shop.
tab2.text2:
Our server settings are:

<TextStyle.Orange>Player & Dinos</>
Max player level - 209 (Before ascension & Chibis)
Max wild dino level - ~500 (Cave dinos can be higher)

<TextStyle.Orange>Server Rates</>
X5 Harvesting / XP / Taming
X0.5 Water & Food Drain (player)
X10 Special Events
X20 Breeding
X19 Baby mature speed
X0.11 Cuddle Interval
X0.2 Mating interval

<TextStyle.Orange>Environment</>
X1.5 Crop Decay speed
X1.5 Crop Growth speed
X0.5 StructurePreventResourceRadiusMultiplier

X2 Supply crate loot quality
X2.5 Fishing loot quality

tab3.text1:
Please don't build so as to block rare resources.
Don't block access to resource caves.
Don't build and block access to the volcano.
Don't build on the obelisk terminals.
Try to keep to 1 main base on each map with up to 2 outposts.
If you build dino traps, either unlock them so others can use them,
or demolish them after use so the map isn't littered with traps everywhere.
tab3.text2:
Harassing other players is forbidden. This includes insults, sexist and radical expressions as well as verbal abuse.
PvP behaviour is forbidden (e.g. thieving & unsolicited interactive behaviour like picking
up other players without their approval and dropping wild dinos in other's bases).
If there is contention for certain lootdrops, the first player to get to and call out the coords of a particular lootdrop has claim to it.
Don't park your dinos on the volcano or at obelisks unattended.
Don't leave your dinos on free wander in the world. Either set them to wander within your base walls, or keep them leashed.
Behaviour that harms the atmosphere on our servers won't be tolerated.

tab4.text1:
We are using an ArkShop plugin with a UI mod. Hit <TextStyle.Orange>F2</> to access the shop.
There are 2 starter packs, which are claimed in the Stash menu:
Start dino - can be claimed once,
Start pack (clothes and tools) can be claimed twice.

You earn ingame currency over time:
- Default (All players) 15 points every 30 minutes (30points/hour)
- VIP 25 points every 30 minutes (50/hour)

Some shop items are VIP accessible only. These are:
 >Teleport to obelisks (You can TP to any obelisk from anywhere)
 >Tier3 & Tier4 EXP purchases (1M & 2M points of EXP - can be applied to either player or dino)
  Tier1 & Tier2 EXP purchases are available to purchase by anyone (50k & 250k EXP).
 >Max Ascendant weapons (Pump-action Shotgun & Longneck Rifle).

More items will be added to the shop over time.
tab4.text2:
If you need help, just ask in game or join our discord and use the help channels there.
An admin will assist you as soon as possible.
Our discord link is below.
